text: , son of Hisamichi, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the late Muromachi period (1336–1573). He held a regent position kampaku from 1525 to 1533 and from 1536 to 1542. Sakihisa was his son. A daughter of his was a consort of shōgun Ashikaga Yoshiteru. |- ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1503 births Category:1566 deaths
title: Konoe Taneie
